name: Set Me Free
description:
Psychological Warning: This game plays with your desire in achieving one goal. Finishing it.

Engage in a Psychological Horror game that will make you crave for it to end.

HOW TO PLAY

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move

SPACE - Jump

You play as "Snow Kid," a mentally unstable kid who was taken to the asylum with his girlfriend Clarise. But a few minutes after he has been taken. Clarise went missing, the staff disappeared, and the powers went out. It's now your opportunity to escape the Asylum and set him free.

Guide Snow Kid to escape by solving puzzles and staying away from the Ghosts that haunts the Asylum. You can kill the Ghosts by luring them into the light of a nearby Holy Candle. Be careful, you can only use the light once, and its powers will worn off. Snow Kid has a fear of the dark, keep him stay with the light before his Sanity Meter draws to zero.
